name: Forest Legends: The Call of Love
name_original: Forest Legends: The Call of Love
description:
Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest, a forbidden love blooms. Guide the human Eveline as she sets out to rescue her beloved from the clutches of a tyrant, learns the truth about magic and discovers her extraordinary destiny! Epic in scope and exploring themes of love and belief, Forest Legends will captivate you from beginning to end!


1 player
HDTV screen resolution: 720p, 1080i, 1080p
DUALSHOCK®3
